attributes.title: TU Berlin research @ "Technoscape: The Architecture of Engineers" MAXXI Museum Rome
attributes.content:
Anna Mendgen´s research project about large sized components for social housing is shown at MAXXI museum in Rome starting September 2022 until April 2023 at the exhibition "Technoscape: The Architecture of Engineers". Curated by Pippo Ciorra and Maristella Casciato. A major exhibition investigating the relationship between architecture, structural engineering and technological and digital innovation increasingly present in our operating and living spaces.   A tale that starts from iconic buildings such as the Sydney Opera House, Nervi's Palazzetto dello Sport in Rome or the Beaubourg in Paris: symbols of our metropolises and masterpieces of construction engineering from the post-war period to the present day. The exhibitions look towards the future through the installations and experiments of seven university research centres worldwide, from the MIT Massachusetts Institute of Technology to the IUSS in Pavia.

[https://www.maxxi.art/en/events/technoscape-larchitettura-dellingegneria/](https://www.maxxi.art/en/events/technoscape-larchitettura-dellingegneria/) link: [bit.ly/MAXXItechnoscape](bit.ly/MAXXItechnoscape) hashtag: #technoscape MAXXI social: Facebook @museomaxxi Instagram @museomaxxi Twitter @Museo_MAXXI
